product.title: Air Straightener Flat Iron, IG INGLAM 2 in 1 Wet to Dry for Hair Styling, 200 Million Negative Ions, No Heat Damage for All Hair Types, Light Pink
product.description:
We have fully considered the women's pain points and calls for hair straightening, and the best way is to remove the heating plate used in traditional straighteners. Without the heating plate, it will not cause irreversible damage to the hair. At the same time, we adopt a linear air outlet design for ventilation, equipped with a high-speed brushless motor, to create a natural and straight hairstyle.* WARM TIPS:
1. Press and hold the power button for 3s to turn on.

2. PLEASE STRAIGHTEN YOUR HAIR WHEN YOUR HAIR IS SEMI-WET FOR THE BEST STRAIGHTENING EFFECT.


INSTRUCTIONS
Regular cleaning of the IG INGLAM Air Straightener will extend the life of the machine. It is recommended that you clean it once a week.

Steps to use the reverse cleaning function:

Keep the straightener turned off, but it needs to be connected to the power supply.




Step 1: First, you need to press and hold the wind speed gear.




Step 2: Press the power switch again for three seconds to turn on the automatic cleaning function. (The time lasts for 15 seconds.)




The cleaning function will automatically stop after the time is up.




Package List:

1 x IG INGLAM Airflow Styler

1 x User Manual

1 x comb

1 x Polyester Cloth Bag




Product Parameter:

Rated Voltage:125V

Frequency:50/60HZ

Rated Power:1000W

At the same time, we adopt a linear air outlet design for ventilation, equipped with a high-speed brushless motor, to create a natural and straight hairstyle.

product.description_full:
We have fully considered the women's pain points and calls for hair straightening, and the best way is to remove the heating plate used in traditional straighteners. Without the heating plate, it will not cause irreversible damage to the hair. At the same time, we adopt a linear air outlet design for ventilation, equipped with a high-speed brushless motor, to create a natural and straight hairstyle.* WARM TIPS:
1. Press and hold the power button for 3s to turn on.

2. PLEASE STRAIGHTEN YOUR HAIR WHEN YOUR HAIR IS SEMI-WET FOR THE BEST STRAIGHTENING EFFECT.


INSTRUCTIONS
Regular cleaning of the IG INGLAM Air Straightener will extend the life of the machine. It is recommended that you clean it once a week.

Steps to use the reverse cleaning function:

Keep the straightener turned off, but it needs to be connected to the power supply.




Step 1: First, you need to press and hold the wind speed gear.




Step 2: Press the power switch again for three seconds to turn on the automatic cleaning function. (The time lasts for 15 seconds.)




The cleaning function will automatically stop after the time is up.




Package List:

1 x IG INGLAM Airflow Styler

1 x User Manual

1 x comb

1 x Polyester Cloth Bag




Product Parameter:

Rated Voltage:125V

Frequency:50/60HZ

Rated Power:1000W * No Hot Plate, No Heat Damage - The air straightener directly abandons the original heating plate inherent in traditional hair straighteners so it will not cause irreversible damage to the hair. At the same time, we use a linear air outlet design to discharge air, equipped with a high-speed 110,000 brushless motor to create natural and straight hair.
 * 4 Air Temp & 3 Wind Speed Settings: The hair straightener flat iron has three wind speed modes, including "LOW" mode, "MEDIUM" mode, and "HIGH" mode, 4 air temp modes including "Cold", "Normal, "Warm", "HOT" which correspond to 0°F, 95℉, 160℉, and 210℉, provides a variety of temperatures to suit all hair types.
 * One-Step Straightening Styling & Drying: Based on the needs of straight hair styling, we adopt a unique double-arm design, which greatly increases the wind speed when combined. From half-wet to Dry, we use directional airflow to comb and straighten the hair, truly achieving blow-dry straightening, which does not damage hair, and creates naturally straight hair. Let your hair blow dry rather than bake.
 * Long-lasting Hair Care: IG INGLAM's independently developed IG-IQ intelligent temperature control technology monitors the air outlet temperature at high frequency. It can monitor the airflow temperature 100 times/second and maintain the temperature difference of each setting at 41°F/5°C. Make the hair care process safer. We also have a built-in negative ion emitter, which continuously emits 200 million negative ions during use, truly achieving skin-care-grade hair care.
 * Safety and After-Sales Guarantee: The flat iron for hair meets U.S. safety requirements and proudly features the ETL Certification seal.

We have fully considered the women's pain points and calls for hair straightening, and the best way is to remove the heating plate used in traditional straighteners. Without the heating plate, it will not cause irreversible damage to the hair. At the same time, we adopt a linear air outlet design for ventilation, equipped with a high-speed brushless motor, to create a natural and straight hairstyle.

* Warm Tips: 

1. Press and hold the power button for 3s to turn on.

2. Please straighten your hair when your hair is semi-wet for the best straightening effect.


Instructions

Regular cleaning of the IG INGLAM Air Straightener will extend the life of the machine. It is recommended that you clean it once a week.

  • No Hot Plate, No Heat Damage - The air straightener directly abandons the original heating plate inherent in traditional hair straighteners so it will not cause irreversible damage to the hair. At the same time, we use a linear air outlet design to discharge air, equipped with a high-speed 110,000 brushless motor to create natural and straight hair.
  • 4 Air Temp & 3 Wind Speed Settings: The hair straightener flat iron has three wind speed modes, including "LOW" mode, "MEDIUM" mode, and "HIGH" mode, 4 air temp modes including "Cold", "Normal, "Warm", "HOT" which correspond to 0°F, 95℉, 160℉, and 210℉, provides a variety of temperatures to suit all hair types.
  • One-Step Straightening Styling & Drying: Based on the needs of straight hair styling, we adopt a unique double-arm design, which greatly increases the wind speed when combined. From half-wet to Dry, we use directional airflow to comb and straighten the hair, truly achieving blow-dry straightening, which does not damage hair, and creates naturally straight hair. Let your hair blow dry rather than bake.
  • Long-lasting Hair Care: IG INGLAM's independently developed IG-IQ intelligent temperature control technology monitors the air outlet temperature at high frequency. It can monitor the airflow temperature 100 times/second and maintain the temperature difference of each setting at 41°F/5°C. Make the hair care process safer. We also have a built-in negative ion emitter, which continuously emits 200 million negative ions during use, truly achieving skin-care-grade hair care.
  • Safety and After-Sales Guarantee: The flat iron for hair meets U.S. safety requirements and proudly features the ETL Certification seal.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
